exclusion_criteria: Not Medically Necessary for Routine Screening Without Symptoms
Not Medically Necessary for Isolated Anterior Knee Pain Without Mechanical Symptoms or Instability
Not Medically Necessary for Mild Osteoarthritis With No Surgical Planning
Not Medically Necessary for Worker's Compensation Cases Without Orthopedic Evaluation
Not Medically Necessary for Member Declines Surgical Intervention Regardless of Findings
documentation_requirements: Submit Recent Clinical Notes Within 30 Days Documenting History and Physical Examination, Specific Clinical Findings, Duration and Character of Symptoms, Conservative Treatment Records, and Medical Necessity Statement Impact

quantity_limits.repeat_imaging: Required within 12 months requires re-authorization if not completed within 60 days
